title: If you have COVID-19
description: If you have COVID-19 you need to self-isolate for 7 days. Find out what else you need to do.
cleaned_text: COVID-19 symptoms at home More information [ ](/testing-and-isolation/if-you-have-covid-19/help-when-you-are-self-isolating/) Help when you are self-isolating The Ministry of Social Development (MSD) can coordinate extra support for you if you need it. [ ](/testing-and-isolation/if-you-have-covid-19/if-you-get-covid-19-while-travelling/) If you get COVID-19 while travelling You may get COVID-19 while you are away from home. If you test positive while travelling, here is what you need to know. [ ](/testing-and-isolation/if-you-have-covid-19/long-covid/) Long COVID Long COVID describes the symptoms that continue or develop after your initial COVID-19 symptoms. [ ](/prepare-and-stay-safe/looking-after-your-mental-wellbeing/) Look after your mental wellbeing It is understandable to feel a range of emotions while unwell. Reach out to friends and whnau for support, or use a support service that is available. [ ](https://covid19.health.nz/advice/children) Caring for tamariki It can be hard supporting your tamariki (children) when they need to isolate with COVID-19. The COVID-19 Health Hub has advice on how to make things easier for children and parents. Last updated: at
